name: Cat.Show
description:
In High School, I made a project called Cat.Show.
After some encouragement, I have decided to upload it here for anyone to play. It's really bad.

One day, a cat appears. Little do you know this cat will send you down a spiraling path of mysteries, legal battles and true love.

- 7 Endings plus a True Ending. Yes Really

- BOTH KEYBOARD AND MOUSE!!! WOW!!!

- It has graphics

- Wait, did you expect them to be good?

- Can be completed in less than 1 hour

HERE IS A LINK TO THE VIDEO EXPLAINING IT'S HISTORY:
